acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Shri Nagen Chutia is present. The case was posted for evidence of the prosecution side. One witness present. She is examined, cross examined and discharged. Issue summons to the remaining witnesses. Prosecution to take steps.
Accused Shri Nagen Chutia is present. The case was posted for evidence of the prosecution side. No witnesses present. Issue fresh summons to the remaining witnesses. Prosecution to take steps.

Accused Shri Nagen Chutia is present. The case was posted for evidence of the prosecution side. No witnesses present. Issue fresh summons to the remaining witnesses. Prosecution to take steps.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Fix 06.09.2019 for evidence.

Accused Shri Nagen Chutia is present. The case was posted for evidence of the prosecution side. Two  witnesses present. They are examined, cross-examined and discharged. Issue summons to the I.O.  Prosecution to take steps.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Fix   23.09.2019 for evidence.

Accused Shri Nagen Chutia is present. The case was posted for evidence of the I.O. I.O. is absent. Issue fresh summons to the I.O.  Prosecution to take steps.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Fix 16.11.2019 for evidence.

Accused Shri Nagen Chutia is present. The case was posted for evidence of prosecution side. M.O. has appeared. She is examined and discharged. Issue summons to the I.O.  Prosecution to take steps.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Fix  13.12.2019 for evidence of I.O.

Accused Shri Nagen Chutia is absent. Cause shown by the Ld. Counsel vide Pt. No. 1917/2019 which is allowed. The case was posted for evidence of I.O. I.O. is absent. Issue fresh summons to the I.O.  Prosecution to take steps.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Fix 13.02.2020 for evidence of I.O.

Case record put up before me as the PO is on leave. Accused Shri Nagen Chutia is present. The case was posted for evidence of I.O. I.O. is absent. Issue fresh summons to the I.O.  Prosecution to take steps.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Fix 01.04.2020 for evidence of I.O.
